summary: Conversion to the UNPB body of the Daedric Armour replacer by MaikCG
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Daedric Female Armour Replacer & Standalone[/size]

This is a conversion of the skimpy Daedric Armour by MaikCG to the UNPB body. It comes both as a Replacer and Standalone version.

I have converted this excellent and skimpy armour to the UNPB body as that's the body I'm using. This file is a conversion of a conversion, I have converted the already converted version by Exeter to the UNP body, saving me time on the slim body.

The pictures were taken on my laptop so they will probably (definitely) look better on your PC. :)

[size=4]Standalone Info[/size]

The Standalone version can be crafted at any forge and has the same requirements of the lore armour:
Daedric Smithing Perk
1 Daedra Heart
3 Leather Strips
5 Ebony Ingots

Stats of the Standalone version are also the same from the lore armour:
Armour: 49 - Weight: 50 - Price: 3200

[size=5]Requirements[/size]

These files are required for this armour to work, install them first:
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5162/]Daedric female armour replacer[/url] by MaikCG (Only required for the replacer version)
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900]UNP BLESSED BODY - UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] by Blessed Redux Project team (Not really, but come on)

[size=5]Credits[/size]

Exeter conversion of MaikCG Daedric Armour to UNP body can be found here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305/[/url]

MaikCG
Exeter
Blessed Redux Project Team
NifScope
Blender
Bethesda
author: An_dz
